page.title: 09INNS
page.content: There are three Inns in our area. They are the Loders Arms, the Crown Inn in Uploders and the Marquis of Lorne in Nettlecombe. The owner of the Loders Arms is Mr. F.J. Davey.We spoke to Mrs Davey about the inn. They have had another pub before this one called the Hare and Hound.She said that this one is bigger.The biggest sellers in soft drinks is orange squash. They sell Bitter,Cider,Wines,Whisky.They get the drinks from Palmers Brewery in BRIDPORT.The brewery has about 40 other pubs.The busiest time of year is July and August.The food they mostly sell is crisps,chocolate and nuts.They have got a beer garden.The opening times are 10:30 - 2:30am and 6:00 to 11:00PM.They have been working there about 6 years.
